results.title: Is drinking cold water bad for your health? Know its risks and benefits
results.description: The debate around cold water consumption continues, with no concrete evidence supporting claims of digestive harm. While cold water may increase nasal mucus thickness and potentially trigger migraines or worsen esophageal issues for some, it offers benefits like preventing overheating during exercise and aiding in post-workout recovery. Additionally, it might contribute to slight weight loss by boosting calorie burn.
